diff_act: 1.Provide a comprehensive report detailing the operation status of each device.
2.Include any periods in which the system was not operational in the report.
3.Indicate any non-operational periods of the DH System in the month report.
4.document any non-operational periods of the DH System, indicating the start and end times of these outages in the month report

regen.absent_element: indication of non-operational periods of the DH system
regen.new_specification: For a given month and year, the month report shall indicate any non-operational periods of the DH System and document these periods, including their start and end times.

regen.absent_element: indicating non-operational periods of the DH System
regen.new_specification: For each month report, the system shall include all periods when the DH System was not operational, indicating the start and end times of these outages.

regen.absent_element: reporting non-operational periods of the DH System with specific start and end times
regen.new_specification: The month report shall include any non-operational periods of the DH System, indicating the start and end times of these outages.

label: The month report shall provide a section that indicates the periods of time when the DH System was not in operation.
absence: indication of periods when the DH System was not in operation
